extendedInfo.description: THIS APP REQUIRES AN ECARLIST TRUETARGET SUBSCRIPTION.  The subscription is available 3 ways:* FREE for CARFAXÂ® dealers with active CARFAX username & password* FREE for eCarList inventory management clients* $75/mo for all other automotive dealerseCarList TrueTarget Mobile is the automotive industry's most complete mobile vehicle appraisal system with the industry's lowest monthly fees!  Get instant access to leading retail, wholesale and vehicle history data.  Works as a stand-alone subscription OR keep your dealership in sync with an eCarList inventory management account.Included Retail Data Sources: Â· AutoTraderÂ® Â· Cars.comÂ® . eBay MotorsÂ®Included Vehicle History Integration:. CARFAXÂ®Optional Wholesale Data Upgrades: . Black BookÂ® . NADA . Kelly Blue BookÂ®. AuctionNetÂ® Market Report. Galves($50/mo per source)Features include: . VIN Scanner for easy keyless input of vehicle. Quick Add: perfect for auctions or faster valuations. Manual VIN Entry. Vehicle Photo Management. Market Metrics: Market Days Supply, Cost to Market, and Price Variation. Access to all past appraisals . Share an appraisal with a friend . Visual interactive graph of competing vehicles . View competing vehicles dealer name, age, and pricing history TrueTarget Mobile is the winner of the 2010 DrivingSales Innovation Cup Award. The award recognizes TrueTarget Mobile for the most innovative product of the year for the automotive industry and was selected from over 2,000 entries. Visit http://www.eCarList.com/TrueTarget/ for more information.

reviews.title: New version no better
reviews.comment: Still crashes. Still frustrated.
reviews.author: Roman Radzins

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Force closes every time I use app.  Works fine with iPhone.  Will give 5 stars once operating as advertised.
reviews.author: Fotios Caranicolas

reviews.title: Very frustrating
reviews.comment: Cannot go back and look at a appraisal without it force closing on my Android phone. Please fix!!!
reviews.author: Greg Long

reviews.title: Crashes every time.... Great when it worked.
reviews.comment: This application worked fine on my iPhone. Great application if it works. Would rate 5 stars. Crashes every time on my Samsung Galaxy Note II when I need to open any of the existing appraisals. If I delete and reinstall application I can open one appraisal only once. Next time it will crash. Cannot add options and packages or select color. This application needs an update with bug fixes ASAP. I submitted many.... many problem reports with no response from developer.
reviews.author: AlphaCars Ural NE

reviews.title: Completely useless
reviews.comment: I have used the iPhone app for almost 7 months without any real problems. Now that I have switched to an android device this app has been nothing but a headache. More than half of my attempts to use the app result in some form of crashing.   Please fix this app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes too often
reviews.comment: Crashes incessantly. Syncing cars every time takes forever. Photos lost in uploads. Should be stored locally until they are for sure uploaded. Want this to work so bad, but it is just struggling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force Close A Lot
reviews.comment: Force close after every appraisal if I try to get back into the car.  Fix it please.  HTC EVO 4G
reviews.author: Jose Mendoza

reviews.title: Sucks.
reviews.comment: Crashes every 5 min.worst app in America
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Force closes doesn\'t upload the pictures I take off my note 2 or Iphone 4s
reviews.author: Austin Craft

reviews.comment: Millions of reports with my system data and no progress shown. Extremely unhelpful customer service representatives.
reviews.author: Luke Pollock

reviews.title: CRASH KING
reviews.comment: You can\'t get much crappier service or response this is such a useful app but like everything else no one gives a crap about the problems or fixing them.
reviews.author: Fritz Hammersen

reviews.title: FIX IT ALREADY!!!
reviews.comment: Constantly crashing. Can\'t load pictures. Otherwise it\'s fine.
reviews.author: Brett Gray

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Please fix or update pictures uploads for Samsung galaxy II. I ude this app 6hrs a day. The pics are taking forever to load
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it
